0.author: Rabbi Chananya Berzon
0.title: Author of “Drashot on Parshot”
0.content: Tzippori Press took my manuscript and produced a clear and professional book. Rabbi David had the keen insight to figure out my theme on each subject and present it to the reader in an erudite manner. A superb job!
